User.utils package¶

Submodules¶

User.utils.dataloader.Dataloader¶

class User.utils.dataloader.Dataloader¶

A class that implements a DataLoader for loading data from a file. Iteration of datasets yields batches of data.

参数:

any – The parameters of dataset to load.

返回:

A DataLoader object.

User.utils.dataloader module¶

class User.utils.dataloader.Dataloader¶

基类：object

A class that implements a DataLoader for loading data from a file. Iteration of datasets yields batches of data.

参数:

any – The parameters of dataset to load.

返回:

A DataLoader object.

class User.utils.dataloader.Datasets¶

基类：object

A class that implements a Datasets class for loading data from a file.

load(name) → array¶

Loads the dataset from a file.

参数:

name (str) – The name of the dataset to load.

返回:

A numpy array of the dataset.

preprocess(name) → None¶

Module contents¶

class User.utils.Datasets¶

基类：object

A class that implements a Datasets class for loading data from a file.

load(name) → array¶

Loads the dataset from a file.

参数:

name (str) – The name of the dataset to load.

返回:

A numpy array of the dataset.
